long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sherlock's Chrome extension will help you to capture, tag and organise all your sources of inspiration in one tidy central place in the cloud:

- Visual inspirations: screenshots, images, and colour palettes etc...
- Links: URLs, your dashboards, white-papers, blogs, videos etc...
- Short form text content: Text-Snippets, short quotes and statistics 

Problems Sherlock will help you solve:

1 - No more messy desktop: 

Add structure to your thought process by mapping all your ideas and inspirations in one central organised place in the cloud.

2 - Add more brain power to your day to day:

Use technology to your advantage and never lose great ideas. Track and organise them at the speed of light.

3 - Stay in your Flow State:

Do not let tools interrupt your creative process. Reduce unnecessary distraction and extend the fluidity between your body and mind.

If you are a designer, writer, journalist, researcher, developer, Sherlock will bring calm and structure to your life so you can simply focus on what you do best, being creative!
